attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
STAFF,PARENTS STUDENTS DO NOT WANT ETONE TO CLOSE. ETONE IS A OUTSTANDING SCHOOL THIS IS WHAT OFSTED SAID. WHY SHOULD OUR CHILDREN SUFFER BECAUSE OTHER SCHOOLS CAN NOT GET IT RIGHT.
PLEASE SIGN THIS PETITION.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
